user.title: Area Occupancy Detection Setup
user.description: Configure area occupancy detection with motion sensors and optional device states

data_description.name: Name for this area (e.g., Living Room, Office)
data_description.motion_sensors: One or more motion sensors that detect occupancy
data_description.media_devices: Media players that indicate room activity
data_description.illuminance_sensors: Light level sensors for environmental changes
data_description.threshold: Probability level to consider area occupied (0-1)
data_description.history_period: Days of historical data to analyze (1-30)
data_description.decay_enabled: Gradually reduce sensor influence over time
data_description.decay_window: Time before motion detection fully decays (seconds)
data_description.decay_type: How quickly sensor readings should decay

error.no_motion_sensors: At least one motion sensor is required
error.invalid_history: History period must be between 1 and 30 days
error.invalid_decay: Decay window must be between 60 and 3600 seconds
error.invalid_confidence: Confidence level must be between 0 and 1
error.name_exists: An area with this name already exists
